info.name: Firefox - Hide Mozilla Heartbeat
info.description: i don't like their "HeartBeat" system , specialy how it appear suddently without explanation. I use their reporting and telemetry functionality. I think is more useful than this marketing stuff.. And since their last updated versions , Firefox became more or less like an "Google Chrome", without it take care our advise and let us to choose how to customize it. By example, Read here : The Future of Developing Firefox Add-ons
